title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS/Linux/Windows; pull and run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or chat endpoints in chains, agents, RAG, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps Ollama REST calls with prompts, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS-Code extension bringing local Ollama models into inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector, PVC, and service exposure.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull models, embeddings, with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + Chroma to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into channels; supports slash commands and custom system prompts.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bolt app that lets users @-mention a bot powered by any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama REST API with GenServer streams for Phoenix/LiveView apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, generation, embeddings, and tool calling.

title: ollama-gpt-script
summary: GPTScript provider that lets you call Ollama models as tools or chat agents in automation scripts.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama generators and embedders in production-grade RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with serde models and tokio streams.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module example that spins up an Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama for local LLM demos with session memory.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client for Ollama with context cancellation, streaming, and model management helpers.
